moremobs.midnightconfig.title: More Mobs Configuration
moremobs.midnightconfig.configure_ingame: §dℹ Info:§r§f To configure this data pack on a world-to-world basis,
join a world and execute the command §o/function more_mobs:settings§r.
moremobs.midnightconfig.info: §dℹ Info:§r§f These settings will be applied to all worlds globally.
moremobs.midnightconfig.info2: Please make sure to rejoin any world for the global settings to take effect.
moremobs.midnightconfig.enable_heads.too:
Default: §aYes§f
If enabled, custom player heads will be given to supported humanoid mobs.
moremobs.midnightconfig.enable_head_drop:
Default: §aYes§f
Custom Heads need to be enabled for this setting to have an effect
moremobs.midnightconfig.enable_additiona: Add additional loot to some mobs

Default: §aYes§f
This includes for example low value tools and low value fishing loot

Default: §aYes§f
This includes for example Dragon Breath, Totem of Undying and Elytra
moremobs.midnightconfig.enable_upside_do:
Default: §aYes§f
If enabled, spiders will turn upside down when hanging on ceilings
Not available for Minecraft 1.20.3-1.21.2 due to MC-128225
moremobs.midnightconfig.enable_let_undea: Let mobs with custom heads burn in daylight

Default: §aYes§f
If enabled, undead mobs with custom heads will burn in the daylight
Only for Minecraft 1.19.4+
modmenu.summaryTranslation.moremobs: Humanoid mobs get new variants through custom player heads or through unused vanilla mobs!
